name: Greed Swarm
description: The Greed Swarm resembles a pile of glittering coins and treasures, capable of moving swiftly through the air.
memorable: It can ambush adventurers by blending in as treasure and regains strength by collecting valuable items.
goals: To ambush and incapacitate adventurers while stealing their valuables.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other treasure-hungry constructs or traps.
environment: Often found in treasure hoards or caves filled with valuable items.
strengths: Great at ambushing unaware targets; fast flying speed.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to force damage and incapacitated by anti-magic effects.
attacks: Uses Coin Slam for close combat and Coin Barrage for ranged attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Gather allows it to regain health and enhance its next attack by pulling valuable items from nearby creatures.
senses: Blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings despite being blind.
additional_information: Can occupy the same space as creatures
Imitates a normal pile of coins when motionless
test_queries: deceptive swarm that disguises as coins
swarm that pulls items from adventurers
